thread.title: Costumer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Costumer

author: Costumer
title: Costumer
text: Very good service and very nice people and helpful i will recommend to anyone they did a really nice job putting new wheels on my car plus they explain everything step by step they will tell you if your car is going to look good on the new wheels that you want to buy or if they will reccomend a different style because is not going to look nice love it really good nice job.
